content.text:
# 2014 WhatsOnStage Awards

The WhatsOnStage Awards, founded in 2001 as the Theatregoers' Choice Awards, are a fan-driven set of awards organised by the theatre website WhatsOnStage.com, based on a popular vote recognising performers and productions of English theatre, with an emphasis on London's West End theatre.
The 2014 Whatsonstage Award winners and nominees were:
{| class="wikitable" width="100%"
! width="50%" |Best New Play
! width="50%" |Best New Musical
|-
| valign="top" |
* The Audience
** Chimerica
** The Events
** The Herd
** Peter and Alice
| valign="top" |
* The Book of Mormon
** Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
** From Here to Eternity
** The Light Princess
** Once
|-
! width="50%" |Best Play Revival
! width="50%" |Best Musical Revival
|-
| valign="top" |
* To Kill a Mockingbird
** Mojo
** The Pride
** Private Lives
** The Weir
| valign="top" |
* The Sound of Music
** Candide
** Chess
** A Chorus Line
** Merrily We Roll Along
|-
! width="50%" |Best Actor in a Play
! width="50%" |Best Actress in a Play
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Daniel Radcliffe – The Cripple of Inishmaan'

** James McAvoy – Macbeth
** Lenny Henry – Fences
** Rory Kinnear – Othello
| valign="top" |
